cause.description:
We believe that immigrants are the core of this society and that it has been the efforts of immigrants that have built this great nation. visit our group: http://wvu.facebook.com/group.php?gid=2209030380
Join the cause and donate what you can to the National Immigration Law Center's immigrant families:
http://www.nilc.org/
"Our mission is to protect and promote the rights and opportunities of low-income immigrants and their family members..."
You don't have to donate to make a statement of well appreciated solidarity, just join!
1. Immigration Laws need reform.
2. Discrimination is unacceptable.
3. We are all created "equal."
cause.mission: Build a vision of harmony and beneficial relations with our neighbors from around the world who seek: Life, Liberty & The pursuit of Happiness!
cause.name: IMMIGRANT RIGHTS
